sentences.sContent: Roosevelt was elected four times to the presidency of the US.
sentences.sCn: 罗斯福四次当选美国总统。

sentences.sContent: There were few real improvements during his presidency.
sentences.sCn: 在他的总统任期内几乎没有什么真正的改善。

synos.tran: 总统（或董事长、会长、大学校长等）的职位（任期）；管辖；支配

trans.tranOther: the position of being the president of a country or organization, or the period of time during which someone is president
